skills.vsCode: My favorite code editor for most programming languages :)
skills.intellij: I use it all the time for Java coding.
skills.visualStudio: Mostly using it with Unity for gamedev. But I have implemented some C++ apps in it and it works great!
skills.linux: I can work in linux environment without a problem.
skills.cmake: I know how to setup and configure a cmake project and that's about it :)
skills.docker: My computer hates docker so I hardly ever use it. But I have some experience from work.
skills.godot: I know Godot pretty well, though I have only made 2D games with it.
